name: react-relay-network-layer
description: Network Layer for React Relay and Express (Batch Queries, AuthToken, Logging, Retry)

scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-es && npm run build-flow
scripts.build-lib: rimraf lib && BABEL_ENV=lib babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d lib
scripts.build-es: rimraf es && BABEL_ENV=es babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d es
scripts.build-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/lib\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.test: npm run coverage && npm run lint
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
